io.spine.tools.mc.js.code.task

Class GenerationTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.mc.js.code.task.GenerationTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppendTypeUrlGetter, CreateParsers, GenerateIndexFile, ResolveImports

    public abstract class GenerationTask
extends java.lang.Object
    A code generation task for Protobuf declarations.

    The class operates on the provided set of Protobuf files and enhances their JavaScript counterparts by generating additional code.

      • filter

        protected io.spine.code.proto.FileSet filter(io.spine.code.proto.FileSet fileSet)
        Filters out files that should not processed by the task.

        The method filters out files that don't belong to the module. A file is considered belonging to the module if it was compiled to JavaScript. A .js file is checked instead of an original .proto file since a module can expose Protobufs defined by other modules and these files still should be handled.

        Parameters:
        fileSet - the files to filter
        Returns:
        the files to perform the taks for

      • generateFor

        protected abstract void generateFor(io.spine.code.proto.FileSet fileSet)
        Generates code for the Protobuf files.

      • generatedRoot

        protected io.spine.tools.js.fs.Directory generatedRoot()
